title: Oldboy
synopsis: With no clue how he came to be imprisoned, drugged and tortured for 15 years, a desperate businessman seeks revenge on his captors.

title: Memories of Murder
synopsis: Working without precedent or advanced forensic technology, two rural cops must rely on primitive methods to catch Korea's first serial killer.

title: Train to Busan
synopsis: As a zombie outbreak sweeps the country, a dad and his daughter take a harrowing train journey in an attempt to reach the only city that's still safe.

title: I Saw the Devil
synopsis: A secret agent discovers how far over the edge he'll go to seek retribution after his fiancée is brutally slain by a psychopathic serial killer.

title: The Host
synopsis: A mutant creature has developed from toxic chemical dumping. When the monster scoops up the granddaughter of a snack-bar owner, he races to save her.

title: The Handmaiden
synopsis: A con man's plan to steal an heiress's heart -- and her fortune -- gets complicated when she falls for the handmaid he hired to help with his scheme.

title: The Chaser
synopsis: A cash-strapped pimp -- and former police detective -- draws upon the skills of his old job to track down his missing stable of prostitutes.

title: MY SASSY GIRL
synopsis: An average college student falls for a beautiful drunk girl he meets on the subway, but keeping up with her wild antics takes a toll on him.

title: Mother
synopsis: A murder rocks a small South Korean town and suspicion quickly falls on a reclusive, mentally challenged -- and alibi-free -- young man.

title: The Wailing
synopsis: When a mysterious disease leads to death and chaos in a mountain village, a policeman with an infected daughter consults a powerful shaman.

title: Joint Security Area
synopsis: When two North Korean soldiers are found dead in the Joint Security Area, the incident threatens to point South and North Korea toward all-out war.

title: A Moment to Remember
synopsis: A romance blossoms between a clothing designer and a cautious young man, but because the two have both been hurt in the past, it develops slowly.

title: The Yellow Sea
synopsis: Faced with desperate circumstances, a hapless cabbie turns hit man. Not knowing the true reason for his assignment, he soon becomes a target himself.

title: The Isle
synopsis: A suicidal ex-cop finds his plan to kill himself thwarted by a mysterious prostitute who won't speak but is determined to win his attention.

title: Time
synopsis: A desperate woman undergoes plastic surgery in order to secretly seduce her former boyfriend under a new identity six months later.

title: The Bow
synopsis: This minimalist drama centers on a 16-year-old girl brought up at sea by a 60-year-old man intent on marrying her as soon as she turns 17.

title: Miracle In Cell No.7
synopsis: This warmhearted comedy relates the story of Yong-gu, a mentally challenged father who's wrongly jailed for the murder of a young girl.

title: Bad Guy
synopsis: Obsessed with privileged girl Sun-hwa, ruthless gangster Han-ki decides to prove that she isn't out of his league in this disturbing drama.

title: The Admiral: Roaring Currents
synopsis: With the odds stacked against him, a Korean admiral defends his land against the Japanese by luring the enemy's massive armada into a deadly trap.

title: The Housemaid
synopsis: A wealthy family's new maid has a fiery affair with the man of the house and soon gains the upper hand in the relationship -- and the household.

title: The Villainess
synopsis: In exchange for freedom to live a normal life, a trained assassin begins a 10-year service as a sleeper agent for a government's secret organization.

title: The Thieves
synopsis: This slick caper flick finds Korean and Chinese professional thieves joining forces to pinch a $20 million diamond from an impenetrable casino vault.

title: A Hard Day
synopsis: In a moment of panic, a homicide detective covers up a fatal hit-and-run accident he committed, then discovers that another detective was a witness.

title: Silenced
synopsis: Amid a multitude of cover-ups, a caring teacher attempts to publicly expose faculty members who are molesting some hearing-impaired students.

title: Along with the Gods: The Two Worlds
synopsis: A firefighter dies and arrives in the afterlife, where guardians shepherd him through seven trials and a perilous journey through different hells.

title: Welcome to Dongmakgol
synopsis: In a village in war-ravaged Korea, fate brings together a crash-landed U.S. fighter pilot, three North Korean soldiers and two South Korean soldiers.

title: Boys Over Flowers
synopsis: Unassuming high school girl Jan Di stands up to -- and eventually falls for -- a spoiled rich kid who belongs to the school's most powerful clique.

title: The Age of Shadows
synopsis: Formerly a Korean resistance fighter, a policeman working for Japan is tasked with tracking down resistance leaders before they acquire explosives.

title: Cold Eyes
synopsis: High-tech bank robbers are pursued by an equally high-tech police surveillance team that includes an observant cadet with an exceptional memory.

title: Tunnel
synopsis: A poorly constructed tunnel collapses, leaving a man trapped in his car with only two bottles of water and his daughter's birthday cake to survive on.

title: No Tears for the Dead
synopsis: Distraught over killing an innocent girl, a hit man chooses instead to save the life of his next target -- the dead girl's mother.

title: Assassination
synopsis: A resistance group in Japanese-occupied Korea breaks a sniper out of prison to carry out an assassination, unaware that a traitor lurks among them.

title: Friend
synopsis: After growing up as best friends, four boys begin to follow their separate paths. Years later they reunite, and a dangerous new rivalry is born.

title: My Love from the Star
synopsis: An alien who came to Earth 400 years ago is almost able to return to his own planet, but when he meets a famous actress, he doesn't want to go home.

title: A Company Man
synopsis: When his new trainee gets killed on the job, an ambitious corporate assassin feels an obligation to start a new life and care for the kid's family.

title: Under the Sun
synopsis: Shot over a year under strict government control, this film reveals the conflicted life of a young girl chosen to join North Korea's Children's Union.

title: Sunny
synopsis: When a transfer student becomes a laughingstock on her first day of school, six girls jump in to help the new kid, forming a tight circle of friends.

title: Montage
synopsis: Fifteen years afters the tragic, unsolved kidnapping of a child, a desperate mother and a detective track a newly emerged abductor with the same M.O.

title: Barking Dogs Never Bite
synopsis: Driven to distraction by a dog yapping endlessly in a nearby apartment, a college lecturer takes drastic action to silence the animal.

title: The Beauty Inside
synopsis: Awakening each day in a different body, Woo-jin must constantly adjust. But the biggest adjustment may be the one his girlfriend has to make.

title: Operation Chromite
synopsis: To pave the way for a major amphibious invasion, a team of South Korean spies goes behind enemy lines to steal a map of North Korean coastal defenses.

title: Dream
synopsis: Jin's life becomes complicated when he discovers that he's inextricably linked to a woman through his dreams, which she acts out while in a trance.

title: Address Unknown
synopsis: In the upheaval and aftermath of the Korean conflict, the lives of three displaced teens collide in ways none of them could have imagined.

title: A Frozen Flower
synopsis: From noted director Ha Yu comes a historical epic set in Korea during the Goryeo Dynasty, when the king must produce an heir or relinquish his throne. The ruler's radical solution to the problem endangers his kingdom and those he holds most dear.

title: Doomsday Book
synopsis: In three stories about the near future, zombies overrun Seoul, a robot achieves enlightenment and a little girl's Internet purchase threatens Earth.

title: The Secret Reunion
synopsis: Years after botching the arrest of a hit man and his protégé, a former South Korean agent hires one of the men for freelance detective work.

title: Sad Movie
synopsis: Intertwining tales about romance and separation follow a firefighter, a theme park worker, an estranged mother and son, and a man seeking a lost love.

title: Pandora
synopsis: When an earthquake hits a Korean village housing a run-down nuclear power plant, a man risks his life to save the country from imminent disaster.

title: Hwayi: A Monster Boy
synopsis: After being kidnapped as a small child and raised by the five men who abducted him, a teenage boy is now forced to join their life in crime.

title: Woochi - The Demon Slayer
synopsis: Spanning four centuries in Korea, this epic action-adventure concerns a powerful pipe and a trio of wizards who will do anything to protect it.

title: Secretly, Greatly
synopsis: One last unexpected mission is given to a trio of North Korean spies living as a village fool, an aspiring singer and a high schooler in South Korea.

title: Gukjeshijang
synopsis: After losing his sister and father, a refugee spends his life fulfilling an oath he made to care for his remaining family, whatever the cost.

title: Commitment
synopsis: After taking on a spying mission to free his sister from a labor camp, a 19-year-old North Korean becomes a target of his own government.

title: Once Upon a Time in High School: The Spirit of Jeet Kune Do
synopsis: In 1978, Hyun-soo transfers to Jungmoon High School, notorious for its severe corporal punishment by teachers and power struggles between gangs.

title: The Silenced
synopsis: In the 1930s, a girl is sent to a boarding school where she notices that strange things are happening to her schoolmates.

title: Full House
synopsis: A wide-eyed scriptwriter returns from a chance vacation abroad to find that she’s suddenly homeless, setting her on a quest to get her house back.

title: Spellbound
synopsis: A young street magician quickly becomes a big name on stage after he teams up with a strange woman who possesses a secret ability to see dead people.

title: Psychokinesis
synopsis: Suddenly possessed with supernatural powers, a father sets out to help his estranged daughter, who's at risk of losing everything she's lived for.

title: Miss Granny
synopsis: After learning she's to be sent to a rest home, an elderly widow goes for a walk and wanders into a photo studio, where she emerges as a 20-year-old.

title: Personal Taste
synopsis: Clumsy Kae-in gets a male roommate who pretends to be gay just to land an address in her ritzy building, and ends up reforming how Kae-in sees love.

title: Memoir of a Murderer
synopsis: Hiding his own murderous past, a man suffering from Alzheimer's must protect his daughter from her boyfriend, who he suspects is also a serial killer.

title: Forgotten
synopsis: When his abducted brother returns seemingly a different man with no memory of the past 19 days, Jin-seok chases after the truth behind the kidnapping.

title: Blind
synopsis: A former police cadet who lost her sight in the accident that killed her brother insists that her past is connected to a current missing persons case.

title: Marathon
synopsis: Based on the true story of Bae Hyeong-jin of South Korea, this film follows autistic Cho-won, who dreams of running a marathon.

title: Playful Kiss

title: Rough Cut

synopsis: Successful novelist and radio DJ Jae-yeol and psychiatrist Hae-soo are constantly at odds, but that changes when they start living in the same house.

title: Kill Me Heal Me
synopsis: To be cured of his seven-personality dissociative identity disorder, a rich heir secretly enlists the help of a pretty psychiatric medical resident.

title: Inside Men
synopsis: Seeking revenge on the politician and tycoon he once worked for, a gangster teams up with an ambitious prosecutor to expose their corrupt dealings.

title: Lucid Dream
synopsis: After searching for his abducted son for three years, a devastated father attempts to track down his missing child through lucid dreams.

title: A Girl at My Door
synopsis: Demoted from Seoul to serve a remote coastal village, a policewoman gets involved in the life of a teenage girl who is being abused by her stepfather.

title: Princess Hours
synopsis: In an alternate monarchical modern Korea, art student Chae-kyung's life is upended when she marries Crown Prince Shin to rescue her destitute family.

title: Too Beautiful to Lie
synopsis: A charming ex-con finds herself pretending to be a pharmacist's fiancée. He objects adamantly, but his family is completely taken in.

title: She Was Pretty
synopsis: After a complete reversal of fortune and looks, childhood sweethearts reunite for the first time in 15 years as employees at a fashion magazine.

title: Deranged
synopsis: When ill people begin drowning themselves, a medical supply salesman investigates -- and discovers a conspiracy to spread an infectious disease.

title: The Guard Post
synopsis: Sent to investigate the massacre of 20 soldiers in a demilitarized zone, a sergeant arrives to find one of his men covered in blood and holding an ax.

title: Howling
synopsis: While investigating a murder case, a detective brushes off his new partner's concern that a bite mark on the victim means something strange is afoot.

title: Sunflower
synopsis: With the support of his adoptive mom and her daughter, an ex-convict vows to shed his old violent ways but struggles to fight the demons of his past.

title: The Great Doctor
synopsis: Admiral Choi Young, a fierce warrior from Korea's Goryeo Dynasty, abducts Dr. Eun Soo 700 years into the future and soon falls for her.

title: Hyeomnyeo: Kar-ui gi-eok
synopsis: For years, a young woman trains in secret to slay the general who killed her parents, but past deceptions and present loyalties will mar her mission.

title: Dream High 2
synopsis: A new crop of students descends on Kirin Arts High School, which has been taken over by Oz Entertainment and its own batch of aspiring stars.

title: Dream High
synopsis: Six dedicated students at Kirin Art High School work to achieve their dreams of becoming stars in the Korean music industry.

title: Han Gong-ju
synopsis: Once just an ordinary 17-year-old girl, Gong-ju is forced to leave her hometown and transfer schools mid-semester in the wake of a traumatic event.

title: Voice of a Murderer
synopsis: When his son is kidnapped from a Seoul playground, South Korean TV news anchor Han Kyung-bae starts receiving phone calls from a sinister voice that demands a ransom in exchange for the boy's life.

title: Rooftop Prince
synopsis: A crown prince is transported 300 years into the future, where he assumes a new identity to be near a woman who resembles his late wife.

title: Oh My Ghost
synopsis: Possessed by the ghost of a lustful virgin, a timid assistant chef becomes confidently libidinous, drawing the attention of a haughty culinary star.

title: Steel Rain
synopsis: Amid a coup, a North Korean agent escapes south with the country's injured leader in an attempt to keep him alive and prevent a Korean war.

title: Steel Rain
synopsis: Amid a coup, a North Korean agent escapes south with the country's injured leader in an attempt to keep him alive and prevent a Korean war.

title: Steel Rain
synopsis: Amid a coup, a North Korean agent escapes south with the country's injured leader in an attempt to keep him alive and prevent a Korean war.

title: The Throne
synopsis: Set in 18th-century Korea, this drama recounts the true tale of a crown prince who, by the king's order, was locked in a rice chest and left to die.

title: Tube
synopsis: Burnt-out transit cop Jay forms an unlikely alliance with pickpocket Kay to stop a terrorist hijacker from blowing up a subway car during rush hour.

title: Eungyo
synopsis: A reclusive elderly poet feels the fire of his youth when gamine schoolgirl Eun-gyo enters his life, to the chagrin of the old man's assistant.

title: Haunters
synopsis: In this thriller, psychic Cho-in exploits his uncanny ability to control people with his gaze, a gift he uses for evil intent.

title: Killer Toon
synopsis: The publisher of a web comic receives a submission that foretells her unusual death, putting the artist in the midst of a phantasmagoric mystery.

title: Asura: The City of Madness
synopsis: Caught between a corrupt mayor and a prosecutor intent on exposing political depravity, a police detective must decide whose side he's on.

title: My Wife Is a Gangster 3: HK Edition

title: Gangnam Blues

synopsis: This fictionalized epic drama portrays the tumultuous life and love of Korea's legendary hero Jumong, who steered the course of a kingdom's history.

synopsis: Dumped by her boyfriend of 15 years for gaining weight, a lawyer gets help from a hotshot personal trainer to get in shape and turn her life around.

title: A Korean Odyssey

title: Master
synopsis: Needing hard evidence to convict a company chairman of fraud, an investigator bargains with the company's tech expert to turn over his boss's ledger.

title: The Concubine

synopsis: A priest and a daring seminarian risk their lives in an attempt to cure a girl of mysterious symptoms they believe are caused by a demonic presence.

title: Fated to Love You

synopsis: Catching the eye of a wealthy gentleman, spunky Ha-won gets hired to live with his three immature grandsons so she can whip them into shape.

title: The Prison
synopsis: A cop-turned-convict discovers a crime syndicate inside a prison lorded over by an inmate crime boss -- and joins in on their nightly heists.

title: Uncontrollably Fond
synopsis: The memory of their painful breakup still fresh in their minds, two former lovers reunite years later as a top actor and a documentary producer.

title: Heartstrings

title: Chaw

synopsis: Four highly accomplished men in their 40s navigate life and romance to find love and success in urban Korea in this male answer to 'Sex and the City.'

title: Nightmare
synopsis: Seven former college pals become victims of the shy, mysterious Eun-ju, a classmate whose apparent suicide unleashes a torrent of deadly revenge.

title: Love in the Moonlight

title: Iris: The Movie
synopsis: Rival special forces agents Hyunjun and Sawoo manage to remain friends -- until a beautiful yet lethal specialist with a secret comes between them.

title: The Scarlet Letter
synopsis: After a police detective gets assigned to a new homicide case, his professional life and secret love affairs begin to collide dangerously.

title: White Night
synopsis: Detective Han Dong-soo investigates a murder linked to a cold case from 14 years ago: The suspect's daughter and the victim's son are still connected.

title: 오늘의 연애
synopsis: An attractive weather girl has her fair share of romance, but always supporting her through her fickle love life is her best guy friend of 18 years.

title: Reply 1988
synopsis: Take a nostalgic trip back to the late 1980s through the lives of five families and their five teenage kids living in a small neighborhood in Seoul.

title: Reply 1997
synopsis: As a teen, Shi Won was obsessed with a boy band. Now 33 years old, Shi Won and her friends are reviving their memories as their school reunion nears.

title: Gu Family Book
synopsis: A being born of a human mother and a mythical creature yearns to become a real human. Can a martial artist and archer help him on his quest?

title: Bluebeard
synopsis: After hearing what seems to be a murder confession from an elderly man under sedation, a doctor gets swept up in an unresolved serial murder case.

title: Winter Sonata
synopsis: Joon-sang (Bae Yong Jun) transfers to a new high school in search for his biological father and there falls for lively and cheerful Yu-jin (Choe Ji Woo). After Joon-sang's sudden disappearance, rumor has it that he was killed by a car accident.

title: Sungkyukwan Scandal
synopsis: In the Joseon dynasty, a female breadwinner takes a job as a substitute test-taker, but soon finds herself attending a men's university in disguise.

title: That Winter, the Wind Blows
synopsis: Seeing the chance to enrich himself by deceiving a blind heiress, clever con man Oh Soo just does what comes naturally -- but his plans soon change.

title: The Lovers and the Despot
synopsis: This firsthand account tells of two kidnapped South Korean movie professionals who became the unwilling personal filmmakers of dictator Kim Jong-il.

title: Penny Pinchers
synopsis: An aimless unemployed loser and a thrifty young woman with creative moneymaking schemes team up in pursuit of prosperity.

title: Vanishing Time: A Boy Who Returned
synopsis: Days after her friends disappear during a trip to a mysterious cave, a girl is approached by a grown man claiming to be one of her missing pals.

title: The Piper
synopsis: In 1950s Korea, a roving piper and his ailing son stumble into a mysterious isolated mountain village that is plagued by flesh-eating rats.

title: Mr. Go
synopsis: To pay off a family debt, young Weiwei signs up her circus-performer mountain gorilla to be an ace slugger for a struggling pro baseball club.

title: Monster
synopsis: When a serial killer slays her sister, street vendor Bok-soon turns her rage into a plan to punish the murderer -- who now targets Bok-soon herself.

title: Petty Romance
synopsis: Desperate for money, a struggling comic artist hires a creative sex columnist to win a lucrative adult cartoon competition.

title: Obsessed
synopsis: In a Korean military camp in 1969, a married colonel falls madly in love with the beautiful wife of his new subordinate officer.

title: Good Doctor
synopsis: A savant-like pediatric surgeon is in constant conflict with a fellow doctor -- a rivalry that heats up when they develop feelings for the same woman.

title: Queen In-hyun's Man
synopsis: A time-transcending fate brings together a Joseon scholar and a struggling 21-century actress who lands a role as Queen In-hyun in a major TV drama.

title: Bad Guys
synopsis: Reinstated to eradicate the worst crimes in the city, a detective requests the release of three convicts to enlist their help in catching the felons.

title: Running Wild
synopsis: A by-the-book prosecutor teams up with a rule-smashing police detective to bring down a powerful gangster with deadly connections.

title: Running Wild
synopsis: While tending to a herd of wild horses, a widow tries to protect a convict rehab program she runs on her ranch from an activist with an agenda.

title: The Himalayas
synopsis: A legendary mountaineer comes back from retirement to lead an expedition team up Mount Everest and recover the bodies of his fellow climbers.

title: Time Renegades
synopsis: A high school teacher from 1983 and a police detective from 2015 use their ability to connect via dreams to alter the destiny of the woman they love.

title: Scarlet Innocence
synopsis: Cast off by a married university professor after their steamy affair, a small-town woman approaches him eight years later with revenge on her mind.

title: Big
synopsis: A smart-mouthed transfer student wakes up from a coma in the body of his teacher's fiancé in this romantic spin on the Tom Hanks classic.

title: The Truth Beneath
synopsis: When her daughter disappears 15 days before the big election, the wife of a rookie politician launches a private search that uncovers terrible truths.

title: The Dino King
synopsis: A baby Tarbosaurus is destined for a hard life: Revenge, death, fear and sadness are all in his future -- as are happiness and, ultimately, hope.

title: The President's Barber
synopsis: The personal barber to the president, as well as his wife and only son, get tangled in the political chaos that gripped South Korea in the late 1900s.

title: Phantom Detective
synopsis: After 20 long years, a private eye finally tracks down his mother's killer only to find he's been kidnapped by a vicious, power-hungry organization.

title: Who Are You: School 2015
synopsis: After losing her memory in an accident, a bullied high school orphan finds herself in the place of an identical-looking girl who's gone missing.

title: Steal My Heart
synopsis: A criminal profiler is in for a shock when a suspect in a hit-and-run accident turns out to be his first love from 10 years ago.

title: Running Turtle
synopsis: When a fugitive steals the gambling winnings of a cop on the verge of losing his job, he sets off to catch the escapee -- and to regain his dignity.

title: My Love, Don't Cross That River
synopsis: After 76 years of marriage, an elderly Korean couple still adore each other like newlyweds -- even as the inevitable goodbyes draw nearer.

title: The Royal Tailor
synopsis: During Korea's Joseon dynasty, a pair of tailors find themselves at fashionable odds while trying to win the king's favor.

title: Thread of Lies
synopsis: In the wake of a 14-year-old girl's suicide, her single mother and older sister seek answers to her seemingly unexpected and sudden death.

title: Two Faces of My Girlfriend
synopsis: A seventh-year college guy finally gets his first girlfriend: a sweet, naïve freshman whose other personality is prone to cussing and beating him up.

title: The Phone
synopsis: A lawyer receives a call from his deceased wife on the anniversary of her murder. Now, he has a chance to prevent the tragedy that ruined his life.

title: The Producers
synopsis: A rookie producer joins the Korean Broadcasting System to be near his secret crush and enters the madcap world of network TV, where ratings rule.

title: Mood of the Day
synopsis: On a train to Busan for business, a woman with a conservative attitude toward romance sits next to a man who's had more flings than he can remember.

title: The Mimic
synopsis: While still grieving her missing son, a mother encounters a lost young girl who shows an unsettling ability to mimic her daughter's voice perfectly.

title: A Tale of Legendary Libido
synopsis: The women in Byun's village ridicule his lack of libido, but Byun has the last laugh when a traveling monk imbues him with the ultimate male power.

title: Don't Cry, Mommy
synopsis: A divorced mom seeks revenge when her only daughter commits suicide after being gang raped by her schoolmates, who receive no punishment in court.

title: Hwarang
synopsis: An elite group of young warriors trained in morals and martial arts finds love and friendship in Silla during Korea’s ancient Three Kingdoms period.

title: Shining Inheritance
synopsis: A series of misunderstandings and unfortunate events conspire to shatter the once-promising life of girl from an affluent family.

title: The Accidental Detective
synopsis: A crime-enthusiast blogger and a veteran police officer team up to prove the innocence of their mutual detective friend who's been accused of murder.

title: Reply 1994
synopsis: All hailing from various parts of Korea, a group of college students go from being complete strangers to a big happy family at a Seoul boarding house.

title: Horror Stories
synopsis: A kidnapped girl is forced to tell scary tales about a serial killer, zombies, siblings under attack and nightmarish surgery.

title: Marrying the Mafia 2
synopsis: Mrs. Hong, the boss of a mafia family, orders her son to settle down and find a wife -- but the girl he falls for turns out to be a state prosecutor.

title: My Tutor Friend 2
synopsis: After traveling to Korea, a Japanese exchange student finds herself forced to share a room with a disagreeable young man coerced into being her tutor.

title: The Sound of Your Heart
synopsis: Based on Korea's longest-running webtoon series, this comedy follows the ridiculous daily lives of a cartoonist, his girlfriend and his subpar family.

title: 26 Years
synopsis: Twenty-six years after the 1980 massacre at Gwangju, South Korea, three relatives of the victims come together to avenge the infamous orchestrator.

title: Blood
synopsis: In the nation's best cancer hospital, terminally ill patients are put under the care of a group of brilliant doctors, including one vampire surgeon.

title: Cart
synopsis: In response to a sudden dismissal of staff, workers at a big retail store begin a protest against their employer's oppressive labor policies.

title: Bridal Mask
synopsis: In 1930s Seoul, a Korean officer working for Japanese colonists pursues a freedom fighter known as Bridal Mask, which leads him down unexpected paths.

title: The Shameless
synopsis: A homicide detective tries to flush out a mob enforcer by befriending the suspect's beautiful girlfriend, but soon develops romantic feelings for her.

title: My Love, My Bride
synopsis: After four years of dating, two lovebirds finally get married -- only to discover the butterfly feelings of the honeymoon phase don't last very long.

title: Whistle Blower
synopsis: With groundbreaking stem cell research making headlines, a news producer receives an insider's report that the results have been fabricated.

title: Tabloid Truth
synopsis: When a scandalized actress takes her own life, her devoted manager probes into the opaque and lucrative world of secret tips and salacious rumors.

title: Five Senses of Eros
synopsis: Explore aspects of passion, including a young man's feelings about a one-night stand, the distress of a couple facing a permanent separation and more.

title: The Deal
synopsis: When a woman falls victim to a brutal serial killer who refuses to divulge where her body is, her detective brother and her husband seek retribution.

title: Rough Play
synopsis: Luck -- though well-deserved -- takes a small-theater actor up the ladder of stardom in a matter of days, but his arrogance soon catches up with him.

title: House of the Disappeared
synopsis: After serving a decades-long prison sentence, Mi-hee returns to the home where her husband died and her son vanished 25 years ago.

title: Something About 1%
synopsis: To get his inheritance, a chaebol heir begins a six-month contract relationship with a teacher his chairman grandfather chose to be his future wife.

title: Forever the Moment
synopsis: Based on a true story, this inspiring drama depicts the Korean women's handball team and their rough-and-tumble journey to the 2004 Summer Olympics.

title: Fatal Intuition
synopsis: With help from a psychic who can foresee others' deaths, a man races to find the person who killed his younger sister -- the only family he had left.

title: Salut d'Amour
synopsis: A chance for a last shot at romance comes to a grumpy 70-year-old supermarket worker when an elderly flower shop owner moves in next door.

title: Dachimawa Lee
synopsis: Armed with gadgets, martial arts moves and slapstick gags, secret agent Dachimawa Lee must retrieve a national treasure in this spy-flick spoof.

title: The Advocate: A Missing Body
synopsis: When his client suddenly confesses to murder in open court, a hotshot attorney embarks on a search for truth to redeem his ruined reputation.

title: Spirits' Homecoming
synopsis: Inspired by a drawing by a former comfort woman, this emotional film follows two Korean girls who are forced into sexual slavery by the Japanese army.

title: Shopping King Louis
synopsis: A young chaebol heir adrift in Seoul suffering memory loss meets a kindly country girl who agrees to help him until he figures out his identity.

title: Sunny
synopsis: With hopes of reuniting with her husband, who left for the Vietnam War without telling her, a young wife joins a traveling band as the lead singer.

title: Lucky Romance
synopsis: Relying on the words of a shaman, a superstitious woman tries to sleep with a man born in the Year of the Tiger in order to save her sister's life.

title: Remember You
synopsis: A lawyer suffering from severe amnesia begins a relationship with a mysterious woman. But as his past slowly comes back, will his new love remain?

title: C'est Si Bon
synopsis: In late 1960s Seoul, in a famed music venue called C'est Si Bon, three twentysomethings form a folk band whose music is inspired by a pretty muse.

title: Invasion of Alien Bikini
synopsis: A self-proclaimed city protector rescues a woman and brings her back to his home only to realize she's an alien who needs him in order to reproduce.

title: Wonderful Nightmare
synopsis: A heavenly mix-up ends in the premature death of an ambitious lawyer. To fix the mistake, she must return to life for a month as a modest housewife.

title: Nine: Nine Time Travels
synopsis: A TV anchorman discovers that a mysterious bundle of incense has the power to send him back in time, where he has the opportunity to alter the past.

title: My Only Love Song
synopsis: When things don't go her way during a shooting for her new show, a top actress runs away in an old van that guides her on a time-traveling journey.

synopsis: At a prestigious boarding school, top students must join forces with the underachievers in the school's dance club to form a cheer squad.

title: Let's Eat 2
synopsis: Two classmates from elementary school reunite as next-door neighbors and discover their relationship was -- and still is -- defined by food.

title: Let’s Eat
synopsis: With the help of her neighbors, a divorced woman residing in a one-person-household apartment complex learns to balance living alone and eating well.

title: Azooma
synopsis: Let down by the system and even her ex-husband, a desperate single mother takes it upon herself to catch the man who molested her 10-year-old daughter.

title: You Call It Passion
synopsis: While struggling to meet the demands of her fiery boss, a junior entertainment reporter discovers the power -- and dirty secrets -- of journalism.

title: Prime Minister and I
synopsis: A widowed politician’s picture-perfect image as a single father is tested when a quirky tabloid reporter gets tangled up in his personal life.

title: Live
synopsis: The police officers at South Korea's busiest patrol division toil day and night as keepers of law and peace -- but the reality is far from orderly.

synopsis: A young Korean girl gets put up for adoption by her unscrupulous uncle to a wealthy American man who appears to be harboring a dark secret.
